title: Go Struct Data Grouping
description: This challenge aims to test your knowledge of Go's structs, which are typed collections of fields. Structs are useful for grouping data together to form records.

meta.title: Mastering Go Struct Data Grouping
meta.description: Learn how to leverage Go's structs for efficient data organization and manipulation.
meta.keywords: go practice, software development, go, data grouping, go labs, go playground online, programming, go lab, struct

verify.name: Verify Student's Go Struct Implementation
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go 语言结构体数据分组
i18n.description: 此挑战旨在测试你对 Go 语言结构体的了解，结构体是字段的类型化集合。结构体对于将数据分组以形成记录很有用。

meta.title: 掌握 Go 语言结构体数据分组
meta.description: 学习如何利用 Go 语言的结构体进行高效的数据组织和操作。
meta.keywords: Go 语言实践, 软件开发, Go 语言, 数据分组, Go 实验, 在线 Go 语言游乐场, 编程, Go 实验, 结构体
